context_bundle.summary: Code coverage: Measure how much code is executed by tests. Metrics: Line coverage (% lines executed), Branch coverage (% conditional branches), Function coverage (% functions called), Statement coverage. Tools: Coverage.py (Python), Istanbul/nyc (JavaScript), JaCoCo (Java), dotnet-coverage (.NET). Target: 70-80% for production code (100% not always practical). Generate reports: HTML, XML (Cobertura), LCOV. CI integration: Fail build if coverage drops below threshold. Focus on critical paths, not 100% coverage.

onboarding.quick_start: Code coverage: Measure test execution. Python (coverage.py): pip install coverage; coverage run -m pytest; coverage report (terminal), coverage html (generates htmlcov/index.html). Pytest: pytest --cov=myapp --cov-report=html --cov-report=term-missing. JavaScript (Jest): jest --coverage (generates coverage/ folder). Node.js (nyc): npx nyc npm test; npx nyc report --reporter=html. Metrics: Line coverage = (lines executed / total lines) * 100. Branch coverage = (branches taken / total branches) * 100. Threshold: pytest --cov=myapp --cov-fail-under=80 (fail if <80%). Config (pyproject.toml): [tool.coverage.run] source = ['src']; omit = ['*/tests/*', '*/migrations/*']; [tool.coverage.report] fail_under = 80; exclude_lines = ['pragma: no cover', 'def __repr__', 'raise NotImplementedError']. CI: Upload to Codecov, Coveralls. Focus: Cover critical paths (authentication, payment), not getters/setters.
common_patterns: Python coverage: coverage run -m pytest; coverage report; coverage html; open htmlcov/index.html
Coverage config (.coveragerc): [run]; source = src; omit = */tests/*, */venv/*; [report]; exclude_lines = pragma: no cover, def __repr__, if TYPE_CHECKING; fail_under = 80; precision = 2
CI (GitHub Actions): - run: pytest --cov=src --cov-report=xml; - uses: codecov/codecov-action@v3; with: file: ./coverage.xml; fail_ci_if_error: true
Branch coverage: coverage run --branch -m pytest; coverage report --show-missing
Exclude from coverage: def helper(): # pragma: no cover; return None
JaCoCo (Java): mvn test jacoco:report; open target/site/jacoco/index.html
Focus areas: Authentication (100%), Payment (100%), Business logic (90%), Utils (70%), UI components (60%)
